value.name: Tri-State family finds WWII casket flag in trash, now looking for soldier’s relatives
value.description: Now they’re trying to find the family it belongs to. Yvette Smith says she and her daughter found the flag in a curbside laundry basket in Trenton, Ohio while scrapping to earn a little extra money.

value.name: Wayne County assistant superintendent receives state leadership award
value.description: WAYNE COUNTY, N.C. (WITN) - The North Carolina School Superintendents’ Association (NCSSA) and the North Carolina Alliance for School Leadership Development (NCASLD) selected Dr. Yvette Smith Mason as a recipient of the Dr. Samuel Houston Leadership Award.
